description: Returns metadata about a query, including query run time in milliseconds, number of events scanned and matched, and query status. If the query results were delivered to an S3 bucket, the response also provides the S3 URI and the delivery status. You must specify either QueryId or QueryAlias. Specifying the QueryAlias parameter returns information about the last query run for the alias. You can provide RefreshId along with QueryAlias to view the query results of a dashboard query for the specified RefreshId.

nested_items.name: QueryString
nested_items.description: The SQL code of a query.

nested_items.name: QueryStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a query. Values for QueryStatus include QUEUED, RUNNING, FINISHED, FAILED, TIMED_OUT, or CANCELLED.

nested_items.name: QueryStatistics
nested_items.description: Metadata about a query, including the number of events that were matched, the total number of events scanned, the query run time in milliseconds, and the query's creation time.

nested_items.name: EventsMatched
nested_items.description: The number of events that matched a query.

nested_items.name: EventsScanned
nested_items.description: The number of events that the query scanned in the event data store.

nested_items.name: BytesScanned
nested_items.description: The total bytes that the query scanned in the event data store. This value matches the number of bytes for which your account is billed for the query, unless the query is still running.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The query's run time, in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the query.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message returned if a query failed.

nested_items.name: DeliveryS3Uri
nested_items.description: The URI for the S3 bucket where CloudTrail delivered query results, if applicable.

nested_items.name: Prompt
nested_items.description: The prompt used for a generated query. For information about generated queries, see Create CloudTrail Lake queries from natural language prompts in the CloudTrail user guide.

nested_items.name: EventDataStoreOwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID of the event data store owner.
